XXsamyu_wu:108: vedanāṃ vedayati visaṃyukto vedayati na saṃyuktaḥ. duḥkhām apy aduḥkhāsukhām api vedanāṃ vedayati visaṃyukto vedayati na saṃyuktaḥ. kena

XXsamyu_wu:125: 1. // bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe. tena khalu samayena tasmin rājagṛhe śarabho nāmaḥ parivrājakaḥ prativasati sumāgadhāyāḥ puṣkaraṇyās tīre. ....... sa evaṃ pariṣadi vācaṃ bhāṣate.
XXsamyu_wu:126: ājñāto me śramaṇānāṃ śākyaputrīyāṇāṃ dharmaḥ. ājñāyaivāhaṃ tasmād dharmavinayād apakrāntaḥ.
XXsamyu_wu:127: 2. atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhne nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāviśan. aśrauṣuḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavo rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya carantaḥ.
XXsamyu_wu:128: asmiṃ rājagṛhe śarabho nāmaḥ parivrājakaḥ prativasati. sa evaṃ pariṣadi
XXsamyu_wu:129: vācaṃ bhāṣate. pūrvavat. śrutvā ca punar rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā
XXsamyu_wu:130: kṛtabhaktakṛtyāḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātaḥ pratikrāntāḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśamya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃs tenopajagmuḥ. upetya bhagavatpādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte nyaṣīdan. ekāṃtaniṣaṇṇāḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavo bhagavantam idam avocan.
XXsamyu_wu:131: 3. iha vayaṃ bhadanta saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāviśāma. aśrauṣma vayaṃ saṃbahulā bhikṣavo rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya carantaḥ. asmiṃ rājagṛhe śarabho nāmaḥ parivrājakaḥ prativasati. sa evaṃ pariṣadi vācaṃ bhāṣate. pūrvavat. sādhu bhagavān yena
XXsamyu_wu:132: sumāgadhāyāḥ puṣkaraṇyās tīraṃ tenopasaṃkrameta anukampām upādāya.

XXsamyu_wu:135: 'rthāyāsanaṃ prajñapayaty evaṃ cāha. niṣīdatāṃ bhagavān prajñapta evāsane.
XXsamyu_wu:136: nyaṣīdad bhagavān prajñapta evāsane. niṣadya bhagavāṃ śarabhaṃ

XXsamyu_wu:139: śākyaputrīyāṇāṃ dharmaḥ. ājñāyaivāhaṃ tasmād dharmavinayād apakrānta.
XXsamyu_wu:140: 6. evam uktaḥ śarabhaḥ parivrājakaḥ tūṣṇīm evābhūt. ........ tvaṃ śarabha kim asi tūṣṇīṃ. sacet te paripūrṇaṃ bhaviṣyati vayam anumodayiṣyāmaḥ.
XXsamyu_wu:141: sacet te aparipūrṇaṃ bhaviṣyati vayaṃ te paripūrṇayiṣyāmaḥ. apīdānīṃ śarabhaḥ parivrājako ..... tūṣṇīm evābhūt. dvir api trir api śarabhaḥ parivrājakaḥ tūṣṇīm evābhūt.

XXsamyu_wu:143: parivrājakam idam avocan. yad eva tvaṃ śramaṇaṃ gautamam upasaṃkramyeyaiva

XXsamyu_wu:145: sacet te paripūrṇaṃ bhaviṣyati vayam anumodayiṣyāmaḥ sacet te aparipūrṇaṃ bhaviṣyati vayaṃ te paripūrṇayiṣyāmaḥ. tvaṃ śarabha kim asi tūṣṇīṃ. ...
XXsamyu_wu:146: apīdānīṃ śarabhaḥ parivrājako ... tūṣṇīm evābhūd dvir api trir api
XXsamyu_wu:148: 8. atha bhagavān śarabhaṃ parivrājakam idam avocat. yo me saced evaṃ
XXsamyu_wu:149: vadet, na śramaṇasya gautamasya tathāgataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas. tam ahaṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca samanuyuñjyāṃ samanugāhyāṃ. tasya sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca samanuyuñjyamānasya samanugāhyamānasya, anyenānyaṃ pratisareta bahirdhā
XXsamyu_wu:150: ... kopaṃ ca doṣaṃ cāpratyayaṃ ca prāduṣkuryāt. ... tūṣṇīṃbhūto vā syān
XXsamyu_wu:153: 9. yo me saced evaṃ vadet* na śramaṇasya gautamasya dharmavinayaḥ, tam ahaṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca samanuyuñjyāṃ samanugāhyāṃ. pūrvavad yāvat tadyathā tvam etarhi śarabha. yo me saced evaṃ vadet, na śramaṇasya gautamasya śrāvakaḥ supratipannaḥ, tam ahaṃ sādhu ca suṣṭḥu ca
XXsamyu_wu:154: samanuyuñjyāṃ samanugāhyāṃ pūrvavat* yāvat tadyathā tvam etarhi śarabha.
XXsamyu_wu:155: 10. atha bhagavān sumāgadhāyāḥ puṣkaraṇyās tīre pariṣadi samyaksiṃhanādaṃ naditvā utthāyāsanāt
XXsamyu_wu:156: 11. atha śarabhasya parivrājakasya svakāḥ sabrahmacāriṇaḥ śarabhaṃ
XXsamyu_wu:157: parivrājakam idam avocan*. tadyathā śarabha. ṛṣabhaś chinnaviṣāṇaḥ śūnyāyāṃ gośālāyāṃ mahānādaṃ naditavyaṃ manyeta, evam eva tvam anyatra śramaṇād gautamāt pariṣadi siṃhanādaṃ naditavyaṃ manyase. tadyathā śarabha bhaḍḍalikā puṃrutakaṃ raviṣyāmīti bhaḍḍalikārutakam eva ravati. ... na bhaḍḍalikāvad asi .. tvam anyatra śramaṇād gautamāt pariṣadi siṃhanādaṃ

XXsamyu_wu:195: 1. // bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe. atha saṃbahulānāṃ brāhmaṇaparivrājakānāṃ sumāgadhāyāḥ puṣkariṇyās tīre
XXsamyu_wu:196: sanniṣaṇṇānāṃ sannipatitānām ayaṃ evaṃrūpo 'bhūd antarākathāsamudāhāra ity api brāhmaṇasatyāni. ity api brāhmaṇasatyāni.
XXsamyu_wu:197: 2. aśrauṣīd bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ saṃbahulānāṃ brāhmaṇaparivrājakānāṃ sumāgadhāyāḥ puṣkariṇyās tīre sanniṣaṇṇānāṃ sannipatitānām ayam evaṃrūpo
XXsamyu_wu:199: viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa. śrutvā ca punar yena sumāgadhāyāḥ puṣkariṇyās
XXsamyu_wu:201: 3. adrākṣuḥ saṃbahulā brāhmaṇaparivrājakā bhagavantaṃ dūrata eva. dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhagavato 'rthāyāsanaṃ prajñapayanty evaṃ cāhur. niṣīdataṃ bhagavān prajñapta evāsane. nyaṣīdad bhagavān prajñapta evāsane. niṣadya bhagavān saṃbahulān brāhmaṇaparivrājakān idam avocat.
XXsamyu_wu:202: 4. kā nu yuṣmākaṃ saṃbahulānāṃ brāhmaṇaparivrājakānāṃ sumāgadhāyāḥ
XXsamyu_wu:203: puṣkariṇyās tīre sanniṣannānāṃ sannipatitānām antarākathā viprakṛtā. kayā cātha kathayaitarhi sanniṣaṇṇāḥ sannipatitāḥ. ihāsmākaṃ bho gautama
XXsamyu_wu:204: saṃbahulānāṃ brāhmaṇaparivrājakānāṃ sumāgadhāyāḥ puṣkariṇyās tīre sanniṣaṇṇānāṃ sannipatitānām ayam evaṃrūpo 'bhūd antarākathāsamudāhāra ity api brāhmaṇasatyāni. ity api brāhmaṇasatyāni. iyam asmākaṃ bho gautama saṃbahulānāṃ brāhmaṇaparivrājakānāṃ sumāgadhāyāḥ puṣkariṇyās tīre
XXsamyu_wu:205: sanniṣaṇṇānāṃ sannipatitānām antarākathā viprakṛtā. tayā ca bho gautama kathayaitarhi sanniṣaṇṇāḥ
XXsamyu_wu:206: 5. trīṇi imāni brāhmaṇasatyāni. yāni mayā svayam abhijñāya sākṣīkṛtvopasaṃpadya praveditāni. katamāni trīṇi.
XXsamyu_wu:207: 6. brāhmaṇā evam āhuḥ. sarve prāṇino 'vadhā iti vadamānā brāhmaṇāḥ satyam āhur na mṛśā. śreyāṃsaḥ sma iti manyante sadṛśā sma iti manyante hīnā sma iti manyante yad atra satyaṃ tad anabhiniveśya sarvaloke maitrāsahagatena cittena viharanti. idaṃ prathamaṃ brāhmaṇasatyaṃ yan mayā svayam abhijñāya sākṣīkṛtvopasaṃpadya praveditaṃ.
XXsamyu_wu:208: 7. brāhmaṇā evam āhuḥ. yat kiṃcit samudayadharmaṃ sarvaṃ nirodhadharmakam iti vadamānā brāhmaṇāḥ satyam āhur na mṛśā. pūrvavad yāvad iti yad atra satyaṃ tad anabhiniviśya sarvaloke udayavyayānudarśino viharaṃti. idaṃ dvitīyaṃ brāhmaṇasatyaṃ yan mayā svayam abhijñāya sākṣīkṛtvopasaṃpadya praveditaṃ.
XXsamyu_wu:209: 8. brāhmaṇā evam āhur. na mama kvacana kaścana kiñcanam asti nāsya kvacana kaścana kiñcanam astīti vadamānā brāhmaṇāḥ satyam āhur na mṛśā. pūrvavad yāvad iti yad atra satyaṃ tad anabhiniviśya sarvaloke amamāyanto
XXsamyu_wu:210: viharaṃti. idaṃ tritīyaṃ brāhmaṇasatyaṃ yan mayā svayam abhijñāya sākṣīkṛtvopasaṃpadya praveditaṃ.
